.. _filters:

#######
Filters
#######

.. only:: html

    :Release: |version|
    :Date: |today|

These pages contain specific information about the types of filters available in ``latools``, and how to use them.

For a general introduction to filtering, head over to the :ref:`filtering` section of the Begginer's Guide.
